Package com.gdxgame.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameInputAdapter
    GameInputAdapter is the core class for input handling.
    GameMenu
    GameMenu is one of the core classes for Label based keyboard menus.
    GameMenuPage
    GameMenuPage is one of the core classes for Label based keyboard menus.
    GameState
    GameState is one of the core classes besides GameStateLogic to handle game states.
    GameStateLogic
    GameStateLogic is one of the core classes besides GameState to handle game states.
    GDXGame
    GDXGame is the entrypoint for each game made with libgdx.
